capabilities.description: Palworld is able to change file ownership arbitrarily
capabilities.name: CHOWN

capabilities.description: Palworld is able to bypass file permission checks
capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE

capabilities.description: Palworld is able to bypass permission checks for file operations
capabilities.name: FOWNER

capabilities.description: Palworld is able to send signals to any process
capabilities.name: KILL

capabilities.description: Palworld is able to bind to privileged ports (< 1024)
capabilities.name: NET_BIND_SERVICE

capabilities.description: Palworld is able to change group ID of processes
capabilities.name: SETGID

capabilities.description: Palworld is able to change user ID of processes
capabilities.name: SETUID

capabilities.description: Palworld is able to override resource limits
capabilities.name: SYS_RESOURCE

app_metadata.description: Palworld is a multiplayer, open-world survival crafting game where you befriend and collect mysterious creatures called "Pals".
app_metadata.name: palworld
app_metadata.title: Palworld

groups.name: User and Group Configuration
groups.description: Configure User and Group for Palworld

attrs.label: Admin Password
attrs.description: Your server admin password

attrs.label: Server Configuration
attrs.description: Configure the server for Palworld

attrs.label: Server Name
attrs.description: Your server name

attrs.label: Server Description
attrs.description: Your server description

attrs.label: Server Password
attrs.description: Your server password, leave blank for no password

attrs.label: Platform
attrs.description: Specify which platforms are allowed to connect

attrs.label: Configure INI Keys
attrs.description:
Enter your INI keys </br>
Updates the keys in PalWorldSettings.ini

attrs.label: Backup
attrs.description: Configure the backup for Palworld

attrs.label: Enabled
attrs.description: Enable the backup for Palworld

attrs.label: Interval
attrs.description: Interval in minutes to backup the server

attrs.label: Keep
attrs.description: How many backups to keep

attrs.label: Game Parameters
attrs.description:
Enter your game parameters </br>
Format: EpicApp=PalServer

attrs.label: Extra Game Parameters
attrs.description:
Enter your extra game parameters </br>
Format: -NoAsyncLoadingThread

attrs.label: Update Public IP
attrs.description:
If enabled the container will check on each container
start if the Public IP is still valid.

attrs.label: Validate
attrs.description: If enabled the container validates the game data

attrs.label: Username
attrs.description: Leave blank for anonymous login

attrs.label: Password
attrs.description: Leave blank for anonymous login

attrs.label: User ID
attrs.description: The user id that Palworld files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Group ID
attrs.description: The group id that Palworld files will be owned by.

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>
- None: The port will not be exposed or published.</br>
Note: If the Dockerfile defines an EXPOSE directive,
the port will still be exposed for inter-container communication regardless of this setting.

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access

attrs.label: Host IPs
attrs.description: IPs on the host to bind this port

attrs.label: Port Bind Mode
attrs.description:
The port bind mode.</br>
- Publish: The port will be published on the host for external access.</br>
- Expose: The port will be exposed for inter-container communication.</br>
- None: The port will not be exposed or published.</br>
Note: If the Dockerfile defines an EXPOSE directive,
the port will still be exposed for inter-container communication regardless of this setting.

enum.description: Publish port on the host for external access

attrs.label: Host IPs
attrs.description: IPs on the host to bind this port

attrs.label: Host Network
attrs.description: Bind to the host network. It's recommended to keep this disabled.

1.2.5.readme:
Palworld

Palworld is a multiplayer, open-world survival crafting game where you befriend and collect mysterious creatures called "Pals".
